data.description: A professional character representing various business roles and personalities, including executives, entrepreneurs, managers, and employees with different skills, backgrounds, and work styles.

dimensions.description: The specific role or position the persona holds within a business.
dimensions.name: Role Type

dimensions.description: The level of expertise the persona possesses in their field.
dimensions.name: Skill Level

dimensions.description: The preferred way the persona approaches their work tasks.
dimensions.name: Work Style

dimensions.description: The number of years the persona has worked in their respective industry.
dimensions.name: Industry Experience

dimensions.description: The approach the persona takes in leading teams or projects.
dimensions.name: Leadership Style

dimensions.description: The preferred method of communication for the persona.
dimensions.name: Communication Preference

dimensions.description: The persona's ability to adjust to new situations or changes in the workplace.
dimensions.name: Adaptability

data.name: Business Persona
